derivation: or כִּתִּיִּי; patrial from an unused name denoting Cyprus (only in the plural);
outline:
Chittim or Kittim = "bruisers"
  1. a general term for all islanders of the Mediterranean Sea
  2. the descendants of Javan, the son of Japheth and grandson of Noah
strongs_def: a Kittite or Cypriote; hence, an islander in general, i.e. the Greeks or Romans on the shores opposite Palestine
